title: Boutique Kochi Heritage Luxury by Relais & Châteaux with Daily Dining
description: Hidden in a quiet corner of the seaside Fort Kochi area, Malabar House is Kochi's first boutique hotel. This colonial-style retreat from the renowned Relais & Châteaux group is a charming blend of traditional Kerala aesthetics, contemporary design and timeless antiques. Located just 1.5 hours from Cochin International Airport and minutes from Kochi's famous attractions, this heritage retreat offers delectable cuisine, stimulating cultural performances, rejuvenating wellness treatments and exciting excursions.
offer_address: 1/269, Parade Road, Opp Parade Ground, Fort Kochi, Kochi, Kerala 682001

title: Boutique Retreat in the Heart of Kochi with Daily Dining and Wine Tasting
description: Discover a beautiful blend of British, Portuguese and Dutch influences in Kochi, Kerala's largest city, with a stay at the boutique Malabar House Kochi. A treasure trove of colonial beauty, the city's first boutique hotel offers a unique combination of old-world charm and contemporary comfort. Relax amid the tranquility of Kerala and enjoy daily breakfast, a choice of daily lunch or dinner and a wine tasting for two.
offer_address: Parade Road, Fort Kochi, Kochi Kochi, 682001 India

title: Boutique Kochi Escape with Daily Breakfast & Daily Dining Credit
description:
Step inside this historic edifice and be treated to a tranquil stay at The Postcard Mandalay Hall Kochi and experience a reflection of the by-gone era with a modern twist. Be inspired by the timeless spirit of this boutique property, located in Jew Town next to a 450-year-old synagogue, that draws influence from the surrounding Mattancherry neighbourhood which has seen the coming and going of many civilizations over time. With five beautiful rooms (also referred to as galleries due to the carefully curated artwork that adorns each space) you can relax in comfort and make use of the hotel facilities, including an onsite pool and tranquil courtyard. Global twists to local flavours are a speciality at Aah restaurant located within the hotel, and you will constantly be delighted with culinary surprises during your stay.

The hotel is an easy 1.5-hour drive away from Cochin International Airport (COK) and is located a short walk away from Fort Kochi. Art and historic walks or neighbourhood tours can be arranged by the staff for you to explore the wonders in and around the property (surcharges may apply). Looking for a different kind of stay in Kerala? Then this is exactly what you need.
offer_address: VI/193, Synagogue Ln, Jew Town, Kappalandimukku, Mattancherry, Kochi, Kerala 682002, India

vendor_name: Amritara The Poovath Beach Front Heritage
title: Serene Fort Kochi Beachfront Stay with Daily Breakfast, One Lunch/Dinner & One Mocktail
description: Standing proudly in Fort Kochi right along the pristine shores of the Arabian Sea, Amritara The Poovath Beach Front Heritage is a colonial building renovated into a stylish boutique hotel. Just an hour's drive from Cochin International Airport (COK), this Amritara property exudes a yesteryear charm that you won't be able to resist. Located close to the beach and Kochi's popular attractions, the hotel is a treat for all history enthusiasts. Beautifully designed rooms, some with views of the majestic Arabian Sea and a private verandah will help you unwind in peace. Exquisite dining at the restaurant will have you singing praises of the delicious coastal treats. Fill your days with a refreshing swim in the gorgeous outdoor poor, guided heritage walks in the area, or go on cycling tours exploring the beautiful Fort Kochi area, choices are aplenty.
location_description: Amritara The Poovath Beach Front Heritage
offer_address: 1, 246, Dutch Cemetery Rd, Fort Kochi, Kochi, Kerala 682001 India

title: Lakeside Kochi 12-Person Villa Escape with Daily All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Lapped by the gentle waters of Vembanad Lake in Kerala, BluSalz Manor Waters Edge is an idyllic six-bedroom luxury villa on Cheppanam Island near Kochi. A scenic one-hour drive from Cochin International Airport (COK), BluSalz Manor Waters Edge is ideal for a big-fat family escape. Boasting charming hospitality and promising uninterrupted privacy, you can call the entire villa your home and take in soothing views of India’s longest lake while enjoying some fun times with your loved ones. With all-inclusive dining perks, you can feast on gorgeous delicacies all through the day and have a blast exploring the serene backwaters of God’s Own Country with fun water experiences like kayaking and speedboat rides. 

Lying less than an hour away from the port city’s main tourist attractions, the villa is also perfect for those who wish to explore Kochi. Fill your days with visits to Fort Kochi, Santa Cruz Cathedral Basilica and the Chinese Fishing Nets.
offer_address: Chathamma South End, Cheppanam Kochi Kerala 682506 India

title: India Waterside Kochi City Break with Sprawling Onsite Spa
description: Between vibrant historic streets and the coconut groves, birdlife and captivating beauty of gentle backwaters lies Crowne Plaza Kochi, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned to allow sightseeing at Fort Kochi, Jew Town and Mattancherry Palace. Enjoy rooftop barbecue at Skygrill or retreat to the hotel’s magnificent Aira Spa for traditional ayurvedic treatments in one of the largest oases of rejuvenation in Kerala.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Kochi, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Xi/641A Kundanoor Junction NH-47 Bypass PO, Maradu, Kochi, Kerala 682304, India

title: Regal Cochin City Stay with Five Onsite Restaurants and Bars
description: In Cochin's rich city centre you will find merchant-lined ports, remnants of colonial heritage and the elegant Holiday Inn Cochin, an IHG Hotel, positioned to take in sweeping city views and laced with grand entrances and pampering amenities. Here, there is no shortage of divine cuisine, with multiple onsite restaurants and bars to whet any appetite. If relaxation is on your itinerary, spend a day lounging on the rooftop and take a dip in the glistening pool or melt away under the experienced hands of a world-class wellness therapist at the Senses & Elements spa.
location_description: Holiday Inn Cochin, an IHG Hotel

title: 5-Star Tropical Kochi Oberoi Stay with Outdoor Pool, Restaurant & Day Spa
description: Experience the rich history and vibrant culture of Kochi with a stay at this relaxed, tropical retreat. Perfectly positioned on Willingdon Island, this luxurious hotel is an easy drive from some of the city's best attractions from the mesmerising Kerala Folklore Museum and the historic Mattancherry Palace. When you're not exploring, indulge in authentic Kerala cuisine at the onsite Travancore restaurant, take a dip in the hotel's tranquil pool or relax in the rejuvenating Trident Spa.
offer_address: Bristow Rd, Willingdon Island, Kochi, Kerala 682003, India

title: Tranquil Kochi Coastal Resort Overlooking the Pacific Ocean with Traditional Onsen
description:
Succumb to the allure of coastal Japan at this resort in Kochi, mere moments from the Pacific Ocean and surrounded by rugged mountain ranges. Seemlessly blending together traditional Japanese and contemporary Western styles, this serene stay boasts a traditional Japanese onsen, a relaxing bathhouse with a natural hot spring that's sure to soothe.

Between moments of relaxation, enjoy a buffet meal at the Locavore restaurant, make a splash in the sprawling outdoor pool or simply retreat to your room designed with comfort in mind. Set out to explore Kochi and pay a visit to the Kochi Castle, stroll the Hirome Market or admire the coastline at Katsurahama Beach.
offer_address: 2995 Ko Nishibun Geiseimura Aki-gun, Kochi 781-5703, Japan
